ComicInfo.Summary:
The first issue of Vanguard Illustrated is a mix of established professionals and new writers and artists, many of which would go on to become shining stars in their own right.
*Story Titles* Libretto by Campiti, Yeates and Bryant Encyclopedias by Baron and Rude Freakwave by Milligan and McCarthy
